dct_title_s: Republik und Demokratische Republik Kongo 1:2 000 000 : reiß- und wasserfest = Republic & Democratic Republic of the Congo 1:2 000 000 : rip & waterproof = République & République Démocratique du Congo 1:2 000 000 : indéchirable et imperméable = República & República Democrática del Congo 1:2 000 000 : irrompible & impermeable / Reise Know-How.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by gradient tints, contours, and spot heights. Road map with tourist features. Panel title. Inset shows southeastern continuation of Democratic Republic of the Congo. Includes index to place names, inset continuation map, location map, color illustrations, and publisher's advertisement. Inset on verso: Lubumbashi.
